abilities.name: Blazing Bulwark
abilities.details: Wǔjiàng generates an <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stack whenever he takes damage from an enemy hero or deals damage with an ability or basic attack. If Wǔjiàng has a <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stack, his body will be surrounding by flame, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) to nearby enemies per second.[n]Each stack increases the damage dealt. At maximum <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, each time the flame deals damage, it will [bf]heal[/] Wujiang for a [bf]percentage of the damage dealt[/].

abilities.name: Fearless Smash
abilities.details: Wǔjiàng leaps to a target enemy, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).[n]At maximum <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, Fearless Smash will also deal damage to surrounding enemies in a small radius around the target, and slightly [db]knock them back[/].

abilities.name: Inferno Fists
abilities.details: Wǔjiàng channels flame on his fists, empowering his basic attacks to deal [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) to surrounding enemies in a small radius around the target.[n]At maximum <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, he gains [bf]increased attack speed[/].

abilities.name: Seismic Kick
abilities.details: Wǔjiàng kicks the ground, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all nearby enemies in a small radius and slowing them for a short duration.[n]At maximum <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, the impact will first [db]knock up[/] the enemies, before slowing them down.

abilities.name: Undying Flame
abilities.details: Wǔjiàng embraces the blessing of the Phoenix, becoming a temporary avatar of pure, unyielding fire. He instantly gains [bf]maximum[/] <span>Blazing Bulwark[/] stacks, and takes [bf]reduced incoming damage[/] by a significant percentage for the next few seconds.
